body:
Thanks for reporting this @JustinZhengBC. The requirement for setting the env variable `LINT=1` is removed in #22854, which hopefully is merged very soon. As @gfyoung, at the moment there is one build in travis that is setting it, so the lining is run once in the CI. If you open a PR with pep8 errors you will know which build it is. :)

If I remember correctly, I intentionally didn't add the `LINT=1` to the docs, as I expected it to be removed before anybody checked that. And because I think the error message is good enough, so anyone trying to run the linting, should be able to know how easily.

I'll close this, as I think this will be fixed when #22854, but feel free to reopen it, if there is anything that I'm missing.
